publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 92
ab.l: Miźmor šira byla ol šabat ḱuńd́a. Jaḥšydyr š́uḱur et́ḿa H-ɣa da zemer oḥuma šemińa joɣarɣy Teńriniń.
Anlatma har ert́ań bylada ševaɣatyjny da inamlyɣyjny keč́aĺar byla.
On ipli qobuz byla on ipli qyǯaḥ byla higajon üśt́uńa qobuz byla.
Ki bijańdirdij ḿeni e YWY iš́ĺarij byla jaratmaḥlary byla qudratlaryjnyn sarnejmyn.
Ńe ulludurlar jaratmaḥlaryj śeniń e H astry teŕańdirĺar fikirĺarij.
Vaĺe t́eńt́ak kiši biĺmejdir da t́eli anlamejdyr bunu.
Jašarɣanda rašaʿlar ḱoǵut́ kibik da č́eč́akĺańadirĺar bar qyluv- čular avanlyḥny tas et́ḿa alarny dunjaɣa dejiń.
Da śeń bijik dunjaɣa dejiń e H.
Ki muna dušmanlaryj śeniń e H ki muna dušmanlaryj taspoladyrlar ajyryladyrlar bar qyluvčular avanlyḥny.
Da ḱot́urd́u karkeńd́eńniń kibik ḿuv́uźumńu śurt́t́uj ḿeni jaša- radoɣon jav byla.
Da baḥty ḱoźum jaman ḱoź byla baɣuvčularymny uturu turuvčular üśt́uḿa jaman et́uv́č́uĺarniń ešit́ti- ĺar zavalyn qulaḥlarym.

Rast ḥurma t́eŕagi kibik jašaryr eŕeź kibik
Levanonda ulɣajyr.
Ornatylɣan bolurlar juv́uńd́a H-nyn azbar- larynda Teńrimiźniń jašaryrlar.
Hanuz evajirĺar pirlikt́a qart- lar da b́eǵov́rejdoɣonlar da jašaradoɣonlar bolurlar.
Anlatma ki t́uźd́ur H jaratuvčum da joḥtur avanlyḥ anda.

app.note: Hebrew word found in the same position in the original text meaning ʻresounding music, musing, meditationʼ (Ernst 138). Though it seems to be used in the meaning of an instrument in Karaim.
